section.title: The First Line Parser
section.para: Purpose of the parser is to parse the first line of a SIP message. The first line is represented by msg_start structure define in file parse_fline.h under parser subdirectory.
The main function of the first line parser is parse_first_line, the function will fill in msg_start structure.
Follow inline comments in the function if you want to add support for a new message type.
